attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for treason.
attributes.additional_details: British people are leaving the UK to fight for terrorists, they are making it clear they will be/are targeting the UK. Just think how anyone feels at losing a relative or friend to terrorists. The UK needs the death penalty reinstated for  treason
attributes.background: We the British people demand the death penalty be reinstated for the crime of treason we have to have a strong deterrent against terrorists Treason is the highest crime and nothing but the death penalty will do.   Death penalty should be by leathal injection, any other method could cause outrage
